title: [Prototyping] dotnet tool for obtaining local sources and project for given nuget
body:
### Issue Description

As part of https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8398 we want to create a CLI tool that will:
* locate nuget in feeds
* locate and sync sources for given nuget (local or in nuget feed)
* obtain and return the project needed to build a given lib from the nuget
* generate build descriptive file for the repository - in order to be used for quicker and more precise reverse searching of projects in the future

### Expected output

Standalone dotnet tool meeting the requirements

nodes.body:
Completed:

The prototype tool: https://github.com/JanKrivanek/PackagesSandbox/tree/main/tool/Microsoft.Build.BuildLink
Build metadata description: https://aka.ms/build-link/buildlink.json
